poem:
### Disturbance

A man in the morning 
types threats on keys,
words spitting hatred 
as the kettle boils
and children lace up shoes. 
Somewhere, an MP pulls a coat 
tighter against the wind,
reads an email that scorches skin,
while the world spins, indifferent 
to cries that etch themselves
into the fabric of her day.
